Package model

Enum GamePhase

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<GamePhase>
model.GamePhase
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<GamePhase>, java.lang.constant.Constable
public enum GamePhase
extends java.lang.Enum<GamePhase>
Enum managing different phases of Warzone Game.

Contains list 0f states and list of possible states to move from current state.

Also provides respective controller object for each state.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Enum

    java.lang.Enum.EnumDesc<E extends java.lang.Enum<E>>

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant Description
    ExecuteOrder
    ExecuteOrder state allowing game engine to execute provided orders
    ExitGame
    ExitGame state ends the game once all countries are conquered
    IssueOrder
    IssueOrder state allowing players to provide list of orders
    LoadGame
    LoadGame state handling load map, player creation and countries allocation operations
    MapEditor
    MapEditor state handling map creation and validation operations
    Reinforcement
    Reinforcement state handling allocation of reinforcement armies to each player after completing execute orders phase
